title: LUNAR LEVEL SHOP RESETTED!
body: So I was playin league then after a game I went to check my lunar shop then 2 of them resetted, I have 2 skins left in there that I want to buy and I am wondering if they will reset again? hopefully they don't because I really want to buy those skins but have to wait!! please help

replies.body:
Hiya! 

The skins that are being replaced in your Lunar Revel Shop are scheduled to go on sale either in January or February. We don't want you to get a Lunar Revel sale only to see it in a regular sale over the next few days, so we have replaced those sales in the Lunar Revel Shop with different offers. They shouldn't reset again.
Sad for me - wanted to buy Hired Gun Lucian for -70%, now i have to pucharse more RP because he will be -50% in February.
